mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM AS RNUM, COUNT(*) OVER() AS TOTAL_COUNT FROM ( SELECT SEND_TO_CAR_ID, MEMB_ID, MGRAPP_ID, TARGET_NM, TARGET_ADDRESS, TARGET_LONX, TARGET_LATY, SEND_STATUS, USE_YN, TO_CHAR(ARRIV_HOPE_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as ARRIV_HOPE_TIME,
EST_TIME, REG_ID,
UPD_ID, TO_CHAR(UPD_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as UPD_DT, TARGET_REAL_LONX, TARGET_REAL_LATY, TARGET_POI_ID, TARGET_ROAD_NAME, TARGET_ROAD_JIBUN, SEARCH_OPTION FROM TB_SEND2CAR WHERE 1=1
AND CAR_OEM IS NULL ORDER BY PROCESS_DT DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM >= (#{startPosition}+1) AND RNUM < (#{startPosition}+1) + #{reqCount}
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_SEND2CAR SET USE_YN= #{useYn}, UPD_DT =SYSDATE, UPD_ID ='SYSTEM' WHERE MEMB_ID = #{membId} AND MGRAPP_ID = #{mgrappId} AND SEND_TO_CAR_ID = #{sendToCarId}
UPDATE TB_SEND2CAR SET SEND_STATUS=#{sendStatus}, UPD_DT =SYSDATE, UPD_ID ='SYSTEM' WHERE MEMB_ID = #{membId} AND SEND_TO_CAR_ID = #{sendToCarId}
mapper.select:
SELECT SEND_TO_CAR_ID, MEMB_ID, MGRAPP_ID, TARGET_NM, TARGET_ADDRESS, TARGET_LONX, TARGET_LATY, SEND_STATUS, USE_YN, TO_CHAR(ARRIV_HOPE_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as ARRIV_HOPE_TIME,
EST_TIME, REG_ID,
UPD_ID, TO_CHAR(UPD_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as UPD_DT, TARGET_REAL_LONX, TARGET_REAL_LATY, TARGET_POI_ID, TARGET_ROAD_NAME, TARGET_ROAD_JIBUN, SEARCH_OPTION FROM TB_SEND2CAR WHERE SEND_STATUS NOT IN 'FINAL'
AND PROCESS_DT > SYSDATE-10
ORDER BY PROCESS_DT DESC
